Key Match Events: Josh Smith put Texas ahead for the first time with a two-run single in the seventh inning
Taylor Ward led off the game with his 22nd homer
Ezequiel Duran lined a two-run double deep into the left-center gap with one out in the fifth after an error by Rendon at third base and a walk
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Globe Life Field with the roof open for the first time since May 17
Others: The Rangers won for the ninth time in 12 games
The Angels have lost 11 of their last 13 games
